title: Welcome to Cympet and Co.
body: Thanks for creating an account! Explore deals and manage your receipts from your Account.

title: Receipt shared
body: An admin has shared a receipt (Order: ORD12345) with you. You can view it from the Receipts page.

title: Access request resolved
body: Your access request for receipt ORD67890 was approved.

title: Monthly summary
body: Your monthly receipts summary is ready. Click to view your activity.

title: New product: Solar Generator
body: We just launched a new Solar Generator with free delivery for a limited time. Check it out!

title: Price drop: Air Conditioner
body: Good news â€” the air conditioner you viewed just dropped in price. Visit the product page to see the new price.

title: Subscription expiring
body: Your premium receipts summary subscription is expiring in 3 days. Renew now to continue receiving monthly reports.

title: Security notice
body: We noticed a password change on your account. If this wasn't you, please contact support immediately.
